reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, though the quality and value for money receive mixed reviews.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable! Looks just like the picture!
items.body: Not sure what everyone else received by the bad reviews but my sweater was so cute!! Fit was perfect. Read more
items.author: Mandi Hansen

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not at all true to size or like the description
items.body: Buyer be warned. I ordered for a holiday party and based on the description “women’s oversized turtleneck batwing sleeve sweater is made of high quality polyester, comfortable, soft, breathable and skin-friendly” I was going to order my normal size Medium based on sizing but ordered a Large to be safe. This must be a YOUTH large. It is NOT oversized, it was tight. The sleeves are not batwing and barely came to wrists and the sweater was cropped and awkwardly tight at my mid section. Don’t waste paying for this item and shipping (as it’s not part of PRIME) Read more
items.author: Meredith Vanderveldt

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars runs super tight in neck and wrists
items.body: I'm tiny, normally an XS, I went with a small and the wrists and neck are so tight! I have to return it because it's way to uncomfortable and dangerously tight. color is correct and sweater material is thick as expected. Sad it didn't work it's really super cute and exactly like the picture! Read more
items.author: Heather Rose

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute holiday sweater
items.body: Purchased this to wear for the holidays and it’s a great sweater! Very warm does run a little big but it was cozy for the cold. Read more
items.author: Cassie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size xl
items.body: I love the sweater Read more
items.author: Nay Nay toy!

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but neck , bottom, cuffs all sewing separate and with a thin string
items.body: I think super cute. craftsmanship lacking. When I pulled down the sweater, the bottom unraveled. I wanted to wear and liked so I just cute the bottom off/finished unraveling. Since sewn on separately there was another seam and just rolled at bottom nicely. I have not washed so that may continue to unwind and ave to throw out. Read more
items.author: Carter

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars No way its a XL
items.body: The waist band would not fit my m/l size daughter! Sizes are not true to size ... arrived after christmas even though said it would be before the holiday. Read more
items.author: B. Drummonds

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money
items.body: I ordered this in a large as suggested. It is tight on the neck and not well made. It has a number of snags. Read more
items.author: Momma that can’t lie

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A Wine Red Sweater, D Rose Red Sweater, E Red Sweater, B Pink Sweater, C Green Sweater. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
